DOC.brief_title: Pregnant Women Views About Ethics Prenatal Whole Genome Sequencing
DOC.detailed_description: The impending implementation prenatal whole genome sequencing ( PWGS ) raise host ethical concern give massive amount genetic information expect parent able learn baby . This project involve cross-sectional quantitative survey pregnant woman explore whether want access kind information provide PWGS , circumstance . The survey address question : What sort information pregnant woman want know baby , ? What , anything , would information ? What kind guidance would pregnant woman like medical team regard fetal genetic testing ? Given range practical ethical challenge pose PWGS , data inform practitioner approach towards PWGS technology develop becomes widely available . It imperative government regulator professional society take account view people directly affected policy create - include patient - craft rule whether , utilize PWGS .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Participants must 18 year age Participants must pregnant ( 8 30 week gestational age ) Participants must speak English Spanish
